title: ISic001623. Dedication to Apollo
body:
1[. 2-3.]ς Στεννιηις
2[Α]π̣πελλουνηις

1[. 2-3.]ΣΣΤΕΝΝΙΗΙΣ
2[.].ΠΕΛΛΟΥΝΗΙΣ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Crawford 2011 from autopsy in 2009;
  • 1: Orsi: [---]ΑΣ; Crawford: 'There is no trace of any letter before the first Σ'

English translation

[-?-]s, son of Stenius (gave this); of Apollo

commentary

Crawford notes that the text uses the Greek onomastic system of personal name + patronym in the genitive.

bibliography

    Vetter 1953 no.197a https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001523 Orsi 1916 195 fig.46 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001701 Parlangèli 1956 37-38 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001684 Mastelloni 2005 277 fig. 2 Crawford 2011 Messana 7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001376 Orioles 2022 755-757 no.3.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002286
